ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Test Problem fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: I mean if us American s can t figure out which darn holes to punch in a ballot card (even a person with a doctorate was quoted as saying that it was confusing)
ygData.messageBody:
I mean if us American's can't figure out which darn holes to punch in a
ballot card (even a person with a doctorate was quoted as saying that it
was confusing) then how can we expect Verant to always get things right. ;-)

Hmm, they are based in San Diego. Surfing programmers? Guards should be
responding to our hails with, "What's up dude? The waves are looking fine
my man!"

I'm just glad that it was detected and fixed before it went live. I'd give
them more credit had they found and detected the bug themselves, but then
again, we never hear about those.

---Windleaf

At 04:16 PM 11/10/00 -0500, you wrote:
>funny how comments like those from verant don't even make me blink anymore.
>
>Minkin, 42 Bard on break on sol ro
>Rakka, 52 necro on sol ro retired because sick of seeing xp not move unless
>camping xp for hours on end
>Perspicuss 5 DE rogue on TZ Hey look mom im playing a class that hasnt been
>nerfed in a while
>
>*sigh*
>
>sorry, just sick of many things at the moment
